battleTraits.name: Eye of the Gods

header.text: Once Per Turn, End of Any Turn

battleTraits.declare: Each friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS** unit that destroyed an enemy unit this turn is a target. Friendly **BEASTS** and non-**HERO MONSTERS** cannot be targeted by this ability.
battleTraits.effect:
Make a reward roll of D6 for each target and apply the corresponding effect below. You can re-roll the reward roll for the target, but if you do so and you roll a 1, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

 | Roll | Effect |
 | ---- | ------ |
 | 1 | _**Snubbed by the Gods:**_ No effect. |
 | 2 | _**Mutative Regrowth:**_ **Heal (3)** the target.|
 | 3 | _**Unnatural Grace:**_ Add 1 to hit rolls for the target's combat attacks for the rest of the battle. |
 | 4 | _**Lurid Aura:**_ The target has **WARD (6+)** for the rest of the battle. If the target already has **WARD (6+)**, it has **WARD (5+)** instead. |
 | 5 | _**Slaughterer's Might:**_ Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target's melee weapons for the rest of the battle. |
 | 6 | _**Champion of Chaos:**_ Pick any other effect.|

 The same effect can be applied multiple times to a unit, and more than 1 effect can apply to a unit at the same time.

battleTraits.name: Marks of Chaos
battleTraits.effect:
Friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS** units have 1 of the following effects based on the Mark of Chaos keyword they have.

 * **UNDIVIDED**: Add 1 to wound rolls for the unit's combat attacks that target a **HERO** or **MONSTER**.
 * **KHORNE**: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the unit's melee weapons for the rest of the turn if the unit charged in the same turn.
 * **TZEENTCH**: The unit has **WARD (4+)** against mortal damage inflicted by **SPELL** abilities and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS**.
 * **NURGLE**: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target the unit.
 * **SLAANESH**: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for the unit.

 If a unit with a Mark of Chaos keyword is replaced, the replacement unit has the same Mark of Chaos keyword.

abilities.name: Ironclad Onslaught

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn

abilities.declare: Pick an objective that is contested by any friendly units to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place a **defiled token** next to the target objective. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit contesting an objective that has a **defiled token**. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

spells.name: Daemonic Speed
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Piston-driven Legs and Daemonic Blade or Claw is 6.

abilities.name: Implacable Advance
abilities.effect: This unit can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Piston-driven Carnage

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, this unit can move 6". During that move, it can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Cursed Destroyers

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 1" of this unit, then pick each other unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that terrain feature to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Oath of Dark Sacrifice

header.text: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase

abilities.effect: If an unmodified casting roll for this unit this phase was 8+, this unit has Ward (5+) for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Sarrakkar Blackwing
abilities.effect: While this unitâ€™s Sarrakkar Blackwing is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Infernal Sorcery
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 3 or more power points, pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard within 3" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove 3 power points from this terrain feature, then add 1 to casting rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Corrupt The Realms
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 9 or more power points, pick an objective or terrain feature within 24" of this terrain feature to be the source. Then, pick any number of enemy units within 3" of the source to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Remove 9 power points from this terrain feature, then roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Draw Power
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Give a number of power points to this terrain feature equal to the roll. This terrain feature can have a maximum of 12 power points at once.

abilities.name: Apex Predator

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unitâ€™s combat attacks that target that Monster for the rest of the turn. This ability also affects Companion weapons.

abilities.name: Iron-willed Overlord
abilities.effect: Add 2 to the control scores of friendly Warriors of Chaos units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: The Knights of Chaos

header.text: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit

abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Warriors of Chaos Cavalry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unitâ€™s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the targetâ€™s attacks for the rest of the turn.

profile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as an Oathsworn.

The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targetâ€™s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy Hero or Monster this turn, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the battle.

profile.notes: This unit can only be taken in Gunnar Brandâ€™s regiment.

abilities.effect: Only critical hits score successful hits for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unitâ€™s Singriâ€™s Warbow for attacks that target enemy units that are within 6" of a friendly Gunnar Brand.

abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unitâ€™s Flameburst Pots and Infernal Fires for attacks that target War Machines or Infantry units with 10 or more models.

abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Blade of Shadows is 6.

abilities.name: The Dark Master

header.text: Once Per Battle, Enemy Hero Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target is picked to use an ability, roll a dice as a reaction. On a 3+, that ability has no effect.

abilities.name: Enfeeble Foe
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

â€¢ Subtract 1 from hit rolls from the targetâ€™s combat attacks.
â€¢ The targetâ€™s combat attacks cannot score critical hits (treat them as regular hits instead).

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly Slaves to Darkness units within this unitâ€™s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+, that target has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Shadow Form
abilities.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use the â€˜Redeployâ€™ or â€˜Rallyâ€™ commands while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Stampede of Iron
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit that is within the targetâ€™s combat range. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If 3 or more mortal damage is inflicted on the target by this ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the targetâ€™s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Swift Death
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Drawn to Power
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Daemon Prince that shares a Mark of Chaos keyword with it, you can re-roll the random characteristic rolls for this unitâ€™s Move and Attacks characteristics.

abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Ogroid Theridons unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unitâ€™s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the targetâ€™s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Fuelled By Sorcery
abilities.effect:
Each time a spell is successfully cast by a unit within 12" of this Manifestation, give this Manifestation 1 ruinous energy point, to a maximum of 6.

Each time this Manifestation uses a Shoot ability, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Darkfire Torrent for each ruinous energy point it has.

If this Manifestation is removed from play, all of its ruinous energy points are lost.

abilities.name: Glory In Battle

abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Warriors of Chaos Infantry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unitâ€™s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the targetâ€™s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Gorbolga is 3.

abilities.name: Gorbolga the Accurs'd
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in combat, roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect:

1 - Uncontrollable Power
Allocate 1 damage point to this unit.

2 - The Spear Slumbers
No effect.

3-5 - White-hot Varanite
Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unitâ€™s Gorbolga for the rest of the turn.

6 - Rampant Mutation
The effect of â€˜White-hot Varaniteâ€™ applies and this unitâ€™s Gorbolga has Crit (Mortal) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the targetâ€™s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.effect: Roll a dice each time a damage point inflicted by a combat attack is allocated to this unit. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Warlord of the First Circle
abilities.effect: If a friendly Varanguard unit uses the â€˜Relentless Killersâ€™ ability while it is wholly within 12" of this unit, that unit does not have Strike-last as a result of that ability.

abilities.name: Carve a Path To Glory
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if it is in combat with an enemy Hero.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the turn. This unit can only use the second Fight ability if it is in combat with an enemy Hero, and if it does so, it must pick an enemy Hero to be the target of all of its attacks.

abilities.name: Oath of Bloodshed

abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if any enemy Heroes were slain by this unitâ€™s combat attacks this turn.

abilities.name: Minions of the Silver Tower
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is set up in reserve in a Silver Tower. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Divert Realmgate
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Units set up this turn using this unitâ€™s â€˜Book of Profane Secretsâ€™ ability can be set up wholly within 18" of this unit and more than 7" from all enemy units instead of the distances in the ability.

abilities.name: Book of Profane Secrets
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in a Silver Tower to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target on the battlefield wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Flailing Fists is 4.

abilities.name: Favour of Chaos
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Slaves to Darkness unit wholly within 12" of this unit that shares a Mark of Chaos keyword with this unit to be the target. Then, make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
Apply 1 of the following effects to the target for the rest of the turn depending on which Mark of Chaos keyword this unit has:

â€¢ Undivided: When the target uses the â€˜Rallyâ€™ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.
â€¢ Khorne: Add 1 to hit rolls for the targetâ€™s attacks.
â€¢ Tzeentch: The target has Ward (5+).
â€¢ Nurgle: Add 1 to wound rolls for the targetâ€™s attacks.
â€¢ Slaanesh: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

If the chanting roll was 8+, you can pick up to 2 eligible units to be the targets instead of 1.

abilities.effect: Friendly Warriors of Chaos units have Ward (6+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

If there are more than 1 friendly Darkoath Wilderfiend units within 12" of the slain model, only 1 of them can be given a sacrifice point for that slain model.

abilities.name: Primal Sorcery
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

Mind Shroud: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of sacrifice points this unit has. If any of the rolls are a 5+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

Warping Balefire: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of sacrifice points this unit has. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

Dark Might: Heal (X) this unit, where X is the number of sacrifice points this unit has.

After applying the effect you picked, reset this unitâ€™s sacrifice points to 0.

abilities.name: Aura of Mutation

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect below. If this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Tzeentch Wizard, you can roll 2 dice instead, pick either result, then apply the corresponding effect below.

1 - Untouched
No effect.

2 - Hideous Disfigurement
Subtract 3 from the targetâ€™s control score until the start of your next turn.

3 - Troggbrains
The target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

4 - Gift of Mutations
Subtract 1" from the targetâ€™s Move characteristic for the rest of the battle.

5 - Horrific Absorption
Inflict D6 mortal damage on the target. Then, Heal (D6) this unit.

6 - Transmogrification
Pick any other effect.

abilities.name: Dominate Mind

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the targetâ€™s Control characteristic, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Bringers of Desolation
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unitâ€™s Rune-etched Weapons while it is contesting an objective you control.

abilities.name: Brutal Momentum
abilities.effect: When this unit uses the â€˜Power Throughâ€™ command, inflict an additional D3 mortal damage on the target and add 3" to the distance this unit can move as part of that ability.

abilities.name: Oracular Visions

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Warriors of Chaos unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a dice.
abilities.effect: On a 3+, the target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Venomous Tail Strike

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Fight For Glory
abilities.effect: The first time each turn that this unit is picked to use a Fight ability in the combat phase, if this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly Slaves to Darkness Heroes, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unitâ€™s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Debilitating Shockwave
abilities.declare: If this Manifestation charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If any models in the target unit are slain by this ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the targetâ€™s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Oath of Conquest

header.text: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase

abilities.effect: If this unit is contesting an objective you control that is wholly within enemy territory, this unit has Ward (5+) for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Zarshia Bittersoul
abilities.effect: While this unitâ€™s Zarshia Bittersoul is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Ravagers of the Mortal Realms
abilities.effect: This unit has Ward (5+) while it is contesting an objective you control.
